mapper.sql: id, sys_user_id, nickname, avatar, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_info(sys_user_id, nickname, avatar, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{sysUserId}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{grade}, #{speciality}, #{faculty}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{className}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_user_info(sys_user_id, nickname, avatar, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.sysUserId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.speciality}, #{entity.faculty}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.className}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_user_info(sys_user_id, nickname, avatar, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.sysUserId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.speciality}, #{entity.faculty}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.className}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update sys_user_id = values(sys_user_id), nickname = values(nickname), avatar = values(avatar), grade = values(grade), speciality = values(speciality), faculty = values(faculty), name = values(name), sex = values(sex), class_name = values(class_name), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)

update sys_user_info
sys_user_id = #{sysUserId},
nickname = #{nickname},
avatar = #{avatar},
grade = #{grade},
speciality = #{speciality},
faculty = #{faculty},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
class_name = #{className},

where id = #{id}
